mapper.insert: INSERT INTO banner ( banner_no, origin_name, stored_name, file_type ) VALUES ( banner_seq.nextval, #{originName}, #{storedName}, #{fileType} )
mapper.select: SELECT banner_no, origin_name, stored_name, file_type FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM banner ORDER BY banner_no DESC ) B ) WHERE rnum <= 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_no, menu, cate, writer_id, writer_nick, write_date, hit, title, price, content, location) VALUES(board_seq.nextval, 4, 1, #{writerId}, '관리자', sysdate, 0, #{title}, 0, #{content}, '서울' )
mapper.select:
SELECT board_no, menu, cate, title, content, write_date FROM board
AND menu = 4 AND cate = 1
ORDER BY board_no DESC
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT board_no, title, content, write_date FROM board WHERE menu = 4 AND cate = 1 ORDER BY board_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 13 ORDER BY board_no DESC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM board
AND menu = 4 AND cate = 1 AND board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT email FROM usertb ORDER BY email

SELECT b.board_no, b.title, b.menu, b.cate, b.writer_id, b.write_date, r.report_no, r.board_no, r.report_id, r.report_type, r.report_chk, TO_CHAR(r.report_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REPORT_DATE FROM board b INNER JOIN report r ON b.board_no = r.board_no ORDER BY b.board_no DESC

SELECT c.board_no, c.cmt_no, c.content, c.writer_nick, r.board_no, r.report_id, r.report_type, r.report_chk, TO_CHAR(r.report_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REPORT_DATE FROM commenttb c INNER JOIN report r ON c.cmt_no = r.board_no
